name: Umami Healthcare
summary: Comprehensive healthcare management platform for hospitals, patients, and workflow management with AI-powered features.
description:
Umami Healthcare Platform is a comprehensive, modern healthcare management platform that addresses the full operational spectrum of healthcare providers. By leveraging AI/ML, cloud-native architecture, and patient-centric design, the platform delivers measurable improvements in financial performance, operational efficiency, and clinical quality.
